but you had you had to host the analysis services outside of rds so you would spin up ec2 instance and
that's where you would host the analysis services and that works but obviously
that involves additional ec2 instance and cost associated not only with that
instance but also with the separate sql server license which from the cost perspective
obviously is suboptimal so starting on april 20th
now you can host the analysis services on the rds instance itself and this will be a focus of today's
